definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: thick darkness (NH [[עֲלָטָה]] (rare); acc. to Ba:ES 5 transp. fr. Ar. gat.ala [be cloudy]; gay’t.alah;un darkness);—abs. ´[[ע]], attending sunset Ge 15:17 (c. vb. masc.; Albr:ZAW xv (1895), 325 Kö:Synt. § 350 e rd. [[הָֽיְתָה]]); ´[[בַּע]] Ez Eze 12:7 (‖[[בָּעֶרֶב]]), v:Eze 12:6, v:Eze 12:12.
